data.sentence: The word وَمَا comes from the root م ا and is associated with the meanings:
The word هُوَ comes from the root ه و and is associated with the meanings: huwa = He (pronoun. masculine 3rd. sing.)

data.meanings: to be thin and lean, useless, fruitless, unprofitable, unproductive, vain, exhausted, joke, talk idle.
data.sentence: The word بِالْهَزْلِ comes from the root ه ز ل and is associated with the meanings: to be thin and lean, useless, fruitless, unprofitable, unproductive, vain, exhausted, joke, talk idle.
